title: Drawing, "Winding River in a Wooded Valley, Vermont", October 1865
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite?, by the artist at various locations: red / see preceeding page / same tree / granit; and by E. Clark, at lower left: (Vermont 1865)
description: Horizontal view of a river winding through wooded banks towards the background, with a hill range visible in central background and part of a house in the middleground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Winding River in a Wooded Valley, Vermont", October 1865.
October 1865. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-186.
